body.p: Even though a receptor might be able to contribute information to more than one sensory modality (such as temperature and pain), what is specific for each receptor.

feedback.p: Each receptor will respond to only one type of stimulus. A receptor that responds to a particular chemical will not also respond to light or pressure changes.
